summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Box Inventory Tracking App with authentication, prediction system, and Excel export. Backend APIs mostly functional with minor JWT validation issues. Frontend fully operational with all key features working correctly.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 'Not authenticated' instead of 200 when valid JWT token is provided
minor_bugs.impact: JWT token validation may have issues, but login/logout still works

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 when no authentication provided
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - error code inconsistency, but protection still works

passed_tests: User login with testuser/test123 credentials works perfectly
Dashboard loads with correct stats (6 box types, 232 inventory, $414.5 value, 2 low stock)
Low stock alerts display correctly on dashboard
Prediction alerts show 'Reorder Now' and days until reorder
Inventory table shows prediction data (avg daily usage, reorder alerts)
Navigation between Dashboard, Inventory, Record Usage, Usage Trends works
Excel export button present and functional
Protected routes redirect to login when not authenticated
User registration mode toggle works (login/register switch)
Logout functionality redirects to login page
All CRUD operations for boxes work (create, read, update, delete)
Usage recording API works with proper validation
Error handling works (404 for non-existent boxes, 400 for insufficient stock)
Data validation works (422 for empty box names)
Excel export endpoint returns binary data correctly
Responsive design and UI elements working well
Toast notifications working for user feedback
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix JWT token validation in /auth/me endpoint - currently returning 403 instead of 200 for valid tokens. This is a minor issue that doesn't affect core functionality.
success_percentage: Backend: 92% (22/24 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all core features working perfectly)
